plot outline: Shyam accidentally meets Shravya and begins to work in her firm and a unique bond forms between them and also they begin spending a lot of time together. As their relationship progresses, he soon realizes that all is not well between the people in the firm and her.
title: Hottegagi Genu Battegagi
plot: Shyam accidentally meets Shravya and begins to work in her firm and a unique bond forms between them and also they begin spending a lot of time together. As their relationship progresses, he soon realizes that all is not well between the people in the firm and her.::shrinivas kulkarni
